roleset.name: support
roleset.note: UNDERPIN-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry, comparison with 'support'. (from underpin.01-v)
UNDERPINNING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, underpin-v.01. No VNcls. (from underpinning.01-n)

example.name: active
example.text: [The share buy-back plan]-1 is likely *trace*-1 to underpin B.A.T's share price.

example.name: passive
example.text: London share prices closed modestly higher largely on technical factors, although [the market]-1 was underpinned *trace*-1 near the end of the session by Wall Street's firmer trend.
example.arg: near the end of the session

example.name: ADJ, arg1
example.text: Thanx for not posting a long , Bandini-esque screed on the philosophical underpinnings and justification for traffic laws and / or imposed car - free zones .
example.arg: for traffic laws and / or imposed car - free zones
